TEXT.TITLE: TORAY INDUSTRIES NAMES NEW PRESIDENT
TEXT.BODY: Toray Industries Inc <TORT.T>, Japan's top synthetic fibre maker, named managing director Katsunosuke Maeda as president, effective April 16. Current president Yoshikazu Ito will become chairman. REUTER
